    /**
     * @template T
     */
     class Box {
        #value;
    
        /** @param {T} initialValue */
                    ~
!!! error TS2304: Cannot find name 'T'.
        constructor(initialValue) {
            this.#value = initialValue;
        }
        
        /** @type {T} */
        get value() {
            return this.#value;
        }
    
        set value(value) {
            this.#value = value;
        }
    }
    
    new Box(3).value = 3;
